exceptions.tactic: apply (Build_KripkeIntuitionisticSemantics L MD kMD M R SM).
exceptions.exn: In environment Var : Type M : Kmodel H : Kmodel_Monotonic M H0 : Kmodel_PreOrder M The term "R" has type "forall M : Kmodel, Relation (Kworlds M)" while it is expected to have type "Relation (Kworlds M)" (cannot unify "Kworlds M" and "Kmodel").

original: apply (Build_KripkeIntuitionisticSemantics L MD kMD M R SM). intros x. apply denote_closed. intro v. apply (H v).
